languages.text: "Как говорил мой отец, "Никогда не останавливайся на достигнутом!" Я уже труп, так отчего бы и не помечтать?"

traits.locale_text: "Мутации — побочный эффект злоупотребления этим "даром". Теперь они надевают маски, чтобы было проще себе лгать. Здесь никто никогда не смотрит на свое отражение, снимая фальшивое лицо. Поверьте мне".

languages.text: "As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."
languages.original_text: "Как говорил мой отец, "Никогда не останавливайся на достигнутом!" Я уже труп, так отчего бы и не помечтать?"

traits.locale_text: "As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."
"As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."
"As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."

"As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."
"As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."

languages.text: “我父亲以前常说，如果一条路已经走了很久，那就继续走下去吧！既然我已经必死无疑，那还不如多做些白日梦。”
languages.original_text: "As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."

traits.locale_text: “我父亲以前常说，如果一条路已经走了很久，那就继续走下去吧！既然我已经必死无疑，那还不如多做些白日梦。”

languages.text: 「私の父がかつて言ったように、『お前は長い道のりを来た、その歩みを続けろ！』私は死んでいるも同然なのだから、少しぐらい夢を見てもいいだろう」
languages.original_text: "As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."

traits.locale_text: 「私の父がかつて言ったように、『お前は長い道のりを来た、その歩みを続けろ！』私は死んでいるも同然なのだから、少しぐらい夢を見てもいいだろう」

languages.text: «Como mi padre solía decir, "si recorres mucho camino, no te pares ahora". Ya soy hombre muerto, así que no veo problema en soñar un poco».
languages.original_text: "As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."

traits.locale_text: «Como mi padre solía decir, "si recorres mucho camino, no te pares ahora". Ya soy hombre muerto, así que no veo problema en soñar un poco».

languages.text: "Babamın hep 'Uzun yol katettiysen ilerlemeye devam etmelisin' derdi. Zaten ölü bir adamım, o yüzden hayal kurabilmeliyim."
languages.original_text: "As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."

traits.locale_text: "Babamın hep 'Uzun yol katettiysen ilerlemeye devam etmelisin' derdi. Zaten ölü bir adamım, o yüzden hayal kurabilmeliyim."

languages.text: « Comme mon père avait l'habitude de le dire "Si tu viens de loin, ne t'arrête pas en si bon chemin". Je suis pour ainsi dire déjà mort, alors autant rêver un peu. »
languages.original_text: "As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."

traits.locale_text: « Comme mon père avait l'habitude de le dire "Si tu viens de loin, ne t'arrête pas en si bon chemin". Je suis pour ainsi dire déjà mort, alors autant rêver un peu. »

languages.text: "Mein Vater hat immer gesagt: 'Wenn du einen langen Weg hinter dir hast, geh einfach weiter.' Ich bin sowieso tot, da kann ich doch noch ein bisschen träumen."
languages.original_text: "As my father used to say, 'if you've come a long way, keep going!' I'm a dead man as it is, so I might as well dream a little."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Vater hat immer gesagt: 'Wenn du einen langen Weg hinter dir hast, geh einfach weiter.' Ich bin sowieso tot, da kann ich doch noch ein bisschen träumen."
